instructions: If you prefer to type a reply, wake your iPhone, then open the App Switcher. (On an iPhone with Face ID, swipe up from the bottom edge and pause; on an iPhone with a Home button, double-click the Home button.) Tap the button that appears at the bottom of the screen to open the email in Mail.
Go to Settings > Control Center > Customize Controls. Tap the Insert button next to each app you want to add.
From the Home screen, swipe right to open Today View. Scroll to the bottom, then tap Edit. Tap the Insert button next to each app you want to add, then tap Done.
